cue cmd echo
stdout 'Hello World!'

-- hello_tool.cue --

message: "Hello \(who)!" // who declared in data.cue
who :: "World"

command: echo: {
    echo: {
        kind:   "exec"
        cmd:    "echo \(message)"
        stdout: string
    }

    task: display: {
        kind: "print"
        text: echo.stdout
    }
}
-- cue.mod --
